casebody.data:
Pfeiffer, Respondent, v. American Surety Co., Appellant. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. June 28, 1890.) Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on verdict of jury.

Argued before Sedgwick, C. J., and Freedman, J.

Stickney & Shepard, for appellant. F. F. Nugent and Wm. H. Arnoux, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
